title: What should I write my college essay about? - Quora

response.answer_text: There can be many things. But, you should pick one that you’re most confident about. I might suggest one that you spent the most of your time on and the one that you got the most benefit from. Speak from experience and back it up with strong evidences and results. Write with a strong thesis and theme. Make sure your support is valid with a strong conclusion. Proofread when you’re done three times!
